attributes.review: Dude as soon as i downloaded this app all my hess trucks up and left, they all sang the song replay and it hurt my ears👹 If i didn’t jump out of my race car bed and smack my head on the shell of my race car bed 634 times and shatter my ear drums than it would’ve kept playing😭 anyways i came form tiktok so yeah
attributes.title: THIS APP STOLE ALL MY HESS TRUCKS

attributes.review: when I first downloaded the app, it was confusing and gave little to no instruction to help set it up. I wasn’t able to access any of the sources and media that was advertised for this app. don’t waste your time!
attributes.title: difficult to navigate

attributes.review: i literally open the app and it asked me if i want notifications and obviously i don’t because trump is so racist and then the app told me that they can sense that i was asian and if i didn’t leave the app immediately trump would deport my family and I. This app was so racist. DELETE THIS APP IMMEDIATELY IF YOU HAVE IT!! OR THE APP STORE CAN JUST REMOVE THIS APP FROM THE APP STORE CAUSE IT IS SO RACIST
attributes.title: HORRIBLE DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: this literally took forever to download! it took days for me to be able to open up the app! i spent so much time and energy on this thing. just for it to be glitchy when i opened it... the audacity😭the first thing i saw was a Cheeto
attributes.title: What even is this 🤢

attributes.review: my great grandma loved trump so when i got this app i thought she would be happy but then she started having a stroke. i was wondering why i was just showing her the app so i look back at my phone screen and it was a picture of a cheeto and i was like who is this (it’s was trump). so this app caused my grandma to die. it was also very glitchy and crashed my phone. this app made my phone very hot and glitchy so i don’t recommend getting this app if you have any iphone or a phone in general👁👅👁
attributes.title: caused death & very glitchy

attributes.review: this app is honestly horrible it took 4 day to download when ever i open this app my phone percent goes down automatically to %1  even if my phone is at 100% and  this only happens when i open this app DONT download this horrible and disgusting,disappointing app
attributes.title: noo

attributes.review: Fellow Trump supporter do not buy this app. There are barely any updates and information given it’s just more advertisement for merch. Just a waste of space on your phone. Save your time and space and keep scrolling past this one y’all.
attributes.title: Just useless 😞

attributes.review: When I downloaded this app it took forever to download 😡and when I complained about it Trump 🍊came to my house and told me if I don’t like it here then leave 🚶‍♂️even though this is stolen land and no one is illegal and only the true owners of this land can tell people to leave
attributes.title: Don’t download 😞.

attributes.review: I had to keep installing and uninstalling this app because it kept closing my phone down very hard to figure out I don’t recommend downloading this until and if the bugs are fixed
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: Terrible app. It’s slow, glitches, and shuts down half the time. Also if homophobia, racism, sexism, and pretty much any horrible thing you can think aren’t your thing you might want to avoid this app. As it helps a man that represents all these things. #votebiden
attributes.title: Ugh Horrible
